sentences.sContent: But exactly what cut through the haze has been one of the big questions in astrophysics.
sentences.sContent_eng: But exactly what cut through the haze has been one of the big questions in astrophysics.
sentences.sCn: 然而，究竟是什么驱散了烟雾？ 这一直是天体物理学上的一个重大问题之一。

sentences.sContent: So for decades, astronomers have used it as a “standard candle” in the field of high-energy astrophysics.
sentences.sContent_eng: So for decades, astronomers have used it as a “standard candle” in the field of high-energy astrophysics.
sentences.sCn: 因此几十年来，天文学家一直将其视为高能天体物理领域的“标准烛光”使用。

sentences.sContent: Unless your physics specialty is deeply theoretical or has to do with astrophysics, you can usually find an industry job that is related to your work.
sentences.sContent_eng: Unless your physics specialty is deeply theoretical or has to do with astrophysics, you can usually find an industry job that is related to your work.
sentences.sCn: 除非你的物理学专业极端理论化，或者是天体物理，否则你通常是可以在工业界找到一个相关的职位的。

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of the chemical structure of the stars and the forces that influence them
